description:
Scans and identifies outdated drivers automatically, and downloads and installs the right update for you with just ONE click, saving you loads of time.

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: Scans and identifies outdated drivers automatically, and downloads and installs the right update for you with just ONE click, saving you loads of time.
author: IObit
